TopicTitle: Can I move the mods folder to another to another hard drive?

Articles.Content:
Basically, in my computer, I have two drives, my computer drive, (Which holds only 118 GB) and a data drive. Is it possible to move the gamedata folder to the data drive, and still have the game work?
Fire

You can have your KSP folder about anywhere you want as long as the structure inside KSP_[OS] is preserved.

If you mean replacing the actual GameData folder by a link to another drive, I don't know; I don't expect a shortcut to work but using linked folders could.
